msbt.message: <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I have that exact same .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Huh? You designed this? Yourself? Are you sure?<10_4 /> That's amazing, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I have that same at my place!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Never knew you could get one in this design, though. Weird!Man, DIY is so darn mysterious.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />? Here? Looking EXACTLY like mine? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" /><10_5 />Whoa.We didn't copy each other So Maybe we're starting a new trend?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I have that exact same
at my place.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Mine has a different design than yours, but that's real cool. It's an expression of yourself, yeah?YOUR design says, "This is me!" And MY design says, "This is me!"And even though we're both saying the same words,<10_4 /> we're sayingum a huh, mansaying different things!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />?! Cool. I've got the same one at my place, just with more crumbs.
